001package edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.ViewGroup;
006import androidx.annotation.ColorInt;
007import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
008import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.R;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.adapter.UserScoresAdapter.Holder;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.databinding.ItemUserScoreBinding;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.gravity.model.pojo.UserScore;
013import java.text.NumberFormat;
014import java.time.LocalDateTime;
015import java.time.ZoneId;
016import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
017import java.time.format.FormatStyle;
018import java.util.List;
019
020public class UserScoresAdapter extends RecyclerView.Adapter<Holder> {
021
022  private final List<UserScore> scores;
023  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
024  private final NumberFormat numberFormatter;
025  private final DateTimeFormatter dateFormatter;
026  private final ZoneId zone;
027  @ColorInt
028  private final int oddRowBackground;
029  @ColorInt
030  private final int evenRowBackground;
031
032  public UserScoresAdapter(Context context, List<UserScore> scores) {
033    this.scores = scores;
034    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
035    dateFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofLocalizedDateTime(FormatStyle.SHORT, FormatStyle.SHORT);
036    oddRowBackground = context.getColor(R.color.background_odd);
037    evenRowBackground = context.getColor(R.color.even_row_background);
038    numberFormatter = NumberFormat.getIntegerInstance();
039    zone = ZoneId.systemDefault();
040  }
041
042  @NonNull
043  @Override
044  public Holder onCreateViewHolder(@NonNull ViewGroup parent, int viewType) {
045    return new Holder(ItemUserScoreBinding.inflate(inflater, parent, false));
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull Holder holder, int position) {
050    holder.bind(position);
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  public int getItemCount() {
055    return scores.size();
056  }
057
058  public class Holder extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder {
059
060    private final ItemUserScoreBinding binding;
061
062    private Holder(@NonNull ItemUserScoreBinding binding) {
063      super(binding.getRoot());
064      this.binding = binding;
065    }
066
067    private void bind(int position) {
068      UserScore score = scores.get(position);
069      binding.ranking.setText(String.valueOf(position + 1));
070      binding.displayName.setText(score.getDisplay_name());
071      binding.score.setText(numberFormatter.format(score.getValue()));
072      binding.created.setText(
073          LocalDateTime.ofInstant(score.getCreated(), zone).format(dateFormatter));
074      binding.getRoot()
075          .setBackgroundColor((position % 2 == 0) ? evenRowBackground : oddRowBackground);
076    }
077
078  }
079
080}
